channel.title: Internet Society Events
channel.description: Latest events to get involved with Internet Society initiatives

item.title: AI SIG "Wire-Free Sewer Vision" Hybrid Hackathon
item.description: A critical event designed to challenge how we monitor and maintain underground sewer systems using cutting-edge, autonomous technology.

item.title: Universal Acceptance on a Multilingual Internet
item.description: This webinar will explore how Universal Acceptance forms the foundation for a truly multilingual Internet, the challenges of regional language support, multilingual DNS, inclusion in digital platforms, and the transformative role of technology, design, and policy in shaping linguistic equity online.

item.title: ISOC PT 2025 Internet Research Prize
item.description: Delivery of the ISOC PT 2025 Internet Research Prize and panel discussion on the Age Control proposals

item.title: UK Internet Governance Forum 2025
item.description: One-day event in London focused on “Building Digital Governance Together,” exploring key issues like digital cooperation, trust, innovation, and universal digital rights to shape the future of internet governance in the UK

item.title: How to Find Funders and Partners
item.description: Webinar organized by Ghana chapter to educate others on how to find funders and partners for their activities.
